button.label: Spelling (standard)
button.screentip: Correct selected text to standard English
button.supertip: Correct the grammar of the selected text and convert it to standard English. The revised variant will replace the original (selected) text.

button.label: Spelling (business)
button.screentip: Correct selected text to standard English in the business style
button.supertip: Correct the grammar of the selected text and convert it to standard English in the business style. The revised variant will replace the original (selected) text.

button.label: Shorten (paraphrase)
button.screentip: Paraphrase selected text to make it slightly shorter
button.supertip: Paraphrase the selected text to make it shorter, but preserve its meaning. The revised variant will replace the original (selected) text.

button.label: Rephrase Title (multi-shot)
button.screentip: Improve the style of selected title (with samples)
button.supertip: Rewrite the selected text which is expected to be a slide title using a more bold, catchy, and impactful wording peculiar to management consulting. The result will replace the selected text. The result is different every time, so don't hesitate to use Ctrl+Z and redo if you don't like the result.

button.label: Rephrase Title (zero-shot)
button.screentip: Improve the style of selected title (without samples)
button.supertip: Rewrite the selected text which is expected to be a slide title using a more bold, catchy, and impactful wording peculiar to management consulting. The result will replace the selected text. The result is different every time, so don't hesitate to use Ctrl+Z and redo if you don't like the result.

button.label: Beautify Title
button.screentip: Suggest several options how to beautify a title
button.supertip: Show a windows with several options of a beautified title. You can select the best option, change the text and replace the selected text with the improved one. Might take a while (1-2 min) to execute.

button.label: Rephrase Polite and Concise
button.screentip: improve the selected text (email or message)
button.supertip: Rewrite the selected message in order to make it more indirect, polite, delicate, and considerate. Keep it concise and to the point, and make it suitable for communication with executive-level management. Ensure that the cultural sensibilities and professional etiquettes common in Arabic and European contexts are considered, maintaining the original message's intent. The result will replace the selected text.

button.label: Rephrase Polite
button.screentip: improve the selected text (email or message)
button.supertip: Rewrite the selected message in order to make it more indirect, polite, delicate, and considerate. Emphasize readiness to collaborate and showing respect for the recipient's time and efforts if suitable. Ensure that the cultural sensibilities and professional etiquettes common in Arabic and European contexts are considered, maintaining the original message's intent. The result will replace the selected text.

button.label: Run AI
button.screentip: Execute query on the AI Playground
button.supertip: Execute a large language model request with the command entered on the active AI Playground slide. The command works only on the slides designed for it.

dropDown.label: Model:
dropDown.supertip: Select default LLM model for the 'chat' endpoint.

checkBox.label: Enforce compliance
checkBox.supertip: Disable actions that can potentially violate PwC Risk policies regarding the usage of external services.

button.label: Settings
button.supertip: Set up API Keys for external service providers (OpenAI, OpenRouter).
